results.title: Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman.
results.text_hl: She had recently been diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@Graves' disease@@@ 3 months prior.

citations.NLM: Alcorn C, Subarajan P, Anderson J. Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman. BMJ Case Rep. 2022 Aug 25;15(8):. PMID: 36007972
citations.BibTeX: @article{36007972, title={Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman.}, author={Alcorn C and Subarajan P and Anderson J}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={15}, number={8}}

results.title: Atrioventricular block: an unusual complication of Graves' disease.
results.text_hl: We report the case of a 10-year-old girl treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Carbimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002231 @@@carbimazole@@@ for @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@Graves' disease@@@ who developed symptomatic 2:1 @DISEASE_Heart_Block @DISEASE_MESH:D006327 @@@heart block@@@. 2:1 @DISEASE_Heart_Block @DISEASE_MESH:D006327 @@@heart block@@@ resolved following cessation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, reduction in @CHEMICAL_Carbimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002231 @@@carbimazole@@@ dose and treatment of suspected @DISEASE_Tonsillitis @DISEASE_MESH:D014069 @@@tonsillitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Adesokan A, Vigneswaran T, Ajzensztejn M, Mathur S. Atrioventricular block: an unusual complication of Graves' disease. BMJ Case Rep. 2017 May 3;2017():. PMID: 28473357
citations.BibTeX: @article{28473357, title={Atrioventricular block: an unusual complication of Graves' disease.}, author={Adesokan A and Vigneswaran T and Ajzensztejn M and Mathur S}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2017}}

results.title: [Acquired sideroblastic anemia and cholestasis in a hyperthyroid patient treated with methimazole and atenolol].
results.text_hl: The authors describe a 62 year-old white male who was diagnosed as @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@autoimmune hyperthyroidism@@@ and treated with @CHEMICAL_Methimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008713 @@@methimazole@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Mamianetti A, Muñoz A, Ronchetti RD, Maccione E, Poggi U, Mugnolo R, Gallo O. [Acquired sideroblastic anemia and cholestasis in a hyperthyroid patient treated with methimazole and atenolol]. Medicina (B Aires). 1995;55(6):693-6. PMID: 8731582
citations.BibTeX: @article{8731582, title={[Acquired sideroblastic anemia and cholestasis in a hyperthyroid patient treated with methimazole and atenolol].}, author={Mamianetti A and Muñoz A and Ronchetti RD and Maccione E and Poggi U and Mugnolo R and Gallo O}, journal={Medicina (B Aires)}, volume={55}, number={6}, pages={693-6}}

results.title: Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis.
results.text_hl: This report describes our experience with 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Thyroid_Crisis @DISEASE_MESH:D013958 @@@thyrotoxic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@Graves' disease@@@ who were prepared for thyroidectomy using only a long-acting orally administered beta-adrenergic blocking agent (@CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@); @CHEMICAL_Iodides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007454 @@@iodides@@@ were not used.

citations.NLM: Gerst PH, Fildes J, Baylor P, Zonszein J. Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis. Arch Surg. 1986 Jul;121(7):838-40. PMID: 2872875
citations.BibTeX: @article{2872875, title={Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis.}, author={Gerst PH and Fildes J and Baylor P and Zonszein J}, journal={Arch Surg}, volume={121}, number={7}, pages={838-40}}
